rukus.text: parhezgaar jannati log baagho aur chashmo mein honge
(un se kaha jayega) salaamti aur aman ke saath is mein dakhil ho jao
un ke dilo mein jo kuch ranjish wa kina tha hum sub kuch nikaal denge, wo bhai bhai bane hoye ek dosre ke aamne saamne taqto par baithe honge
na to waha unhe koi takleef cho sakti hai aur na wo wahaa se kabhi nkaale jayenge
mere bandho ko qabar de do ke main bahuth hee baqshne wala aur bada hee meherbaan hoon
aur saath hee mere azaab bhi nihaayath dardnaak hai
unhe ibraheem ke mehmaano ka (bhi) haal suna do
ke jab unhone un ke paas aa kar salaam kaha to unhone kaha ke hum ko to tum se dar lagta hai
unhone kaha daro nahi, hum tujhe ek saahebe ilm farzand ki bashaarat dete hai
kaha kya is bhudaape ke aa jaane ke baadh tum mujhe khush qabri dete ho! ye khush qabri tum kaise de rahe ho
unhone kaha hum aap ko bilkul sacchi khush qabri sunaate hai, aap mayoos logo mein shaamil na ho
kaha apne rab taâ€™ala ki rehmat se na ummid to sirf gumraah aur behke hoye log hee hote hai
pucha ke Allah ke bheje hoye (farishto!) tumhara aisa kya ehem kaam hai
unhone jawaab diya ke hum mujrim khaum ki taraf bheje gaye hai
magar khandaan looth ke, hum un sub ko to zaroor bacha lenge
sivayae us (looth) ki biwi ke, ke hum ne ose rukne aur baaqi reh jaane walo mein muqarrar kar diya hai
